peril.model.states

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.states.ModelState
        • peril.model.states.Attack

  • public final class Attack
extends ModelState
    The logic of the ModelState where the current ModelPlayer can select any of their ModelCountrys and then a ModelCountry that is directly linked to the ModelPlayer that is ruled by an enemy ModelPlayer.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.05
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelState

                             ModelCountry target)

        target - The target ModelCountry.
